basics.name: Amine Amellouk
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software developer with a passion for the Back-End engineering and a background in economics. Comfortable with building REST APIs and Microservices as well as SPAs, my tech stacks consist mainly of Javascript, C# and Dart. I'm an advocate for documentation, good architecture and the best practices

tasks: Built and managed a complex Microservices project using NodeJS (NestJS).
Worked on multiple Front-Ends, one being an e-commerce website with a CMS and another being an administration panel for a mobile application.
Had setup and managed multiple environments servers with creating pipeline scripts using Jenkins, Nginx and Docker.
Researched and written documents that proved valuable for architecture and decision making.
Developed a complexe API using the Microservices architecture with Eureka, Zuul, NestJS, MongoDB, AWS.
Established the continuous delivery with Jenkins and Bitbucket as version control system.
Contributed to the development of a Flutter mobile application.
Maintained the documentation and worked in an environment using the Agile Scrum methodology.

education.institution: IT-Learning - Faculté des Sciences et Technique de Settat

thesis.title: Étude et réalisation d'une plateforme de guide touristique
Conception et réalisation d'une application de gestion de notes
L'impact de l'investissement public et privé sur la croissance économique

skills.experiencedWith: JavaScript, TypeScript, C#, NestJS, Node.JS, Angular, Svelte, REST APIs, Microservices, UML, C4 Model, Git, Docker, MongoDB, .Net
skills.familiarWith: Redis, Vue, PostgreSQL, Dart, Jenkins, GraphQL, Firebase
